mapper.insert: insert into PBCRS_REPORT_MOTCLTCTRBSSGMTM (MOTGACLTALCTRCTBSSGMTSEQNO, INFRECTYPE, CCCODE, RPTDATE, RPTDATECODE, INFOIDTYPE, NAME, CERTTYPE, CERTNUM, MNGMTORGCODE, REPORTFLAG,ETL_DATE,SOURCESYS ) select MOTGACLTALCTRCTBSSGMTSEQNO, INFRECTYPE, CCCODE, RPTDATE, RPTDATECODE, INFOIDTYPE, NAME, CERTTYPE, CERTNUM, MNGMTORGCODE, '0',ETL_DATE,SOURCESYS from PBCRS_REPORT_MOTCLTCTRBSSGMT where MOTGACLTALCTRCTBSSGMTSEQNO = #{MotgaCltalCtrctBsSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: update PBCRS_REPORT_MOTCLTCTRBSSGMT set INFRECTYPE = #{InfRecType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CCCODE = #{CcCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RPTDATE = #{RptDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RPTDATECODE = #{RptDateCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INFOIDTYPE = #{InfoIDType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{Name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CERTTYPE = #{CertType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CERTNUM = #{CertNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MNGMTORGCODE = #{MngmtOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REPORTFLAG = #{reportflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ISDEL = #{IsDel,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where MOTGACLTALCTRCTBSSGMTSEQNO = #{MotgaCltalCtrctBsSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select MOTGACLTALCTRCTBSSGMTSEQNO, INFRECTYPE, CCCODE, RPTDATE, RPTDATECODE, INFOIDTYPE, NAME, CERTTYPE, CERTNUM, MNGMTORGCODE, REPORTFLAG,ISDEL,SOURCESYS,ORG_CODE from PBCRS_REPORT_MOTCLTCTRBSSGMT where MOTGACLTALCTRCTBSSGMTSEQNO = #{MotgaCltalCtrctBsSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select MOTGACLTALCTRCTBSSGMTSEQNO, INFRECTYPE, CCCODE, RPTDATE, RPTDATECODE, INFOIDTYPE, NAME, CERTTYPE, CERTNUM, MNGMTORGCODE, REPORTFLAG from PBCRS_REPORT_MOTCLTCTRBSSGMT
select count(1) from PBCRS_REPORT_MotCltCtrBsSgmt info1 where 1=1
